name: Fall Self-Striping Yarn Club
description:
This is for three months of self-striping or gradient sock yarn (September, October, November of 2013). For now, there are only 20 slots. The first club will arrive at your home before the last day in September if you live in the continental United States.

All yarns will be between 400 and 500 yards. Typical fibers are: merino, falkland merino/nylon, bfl/nylon, BFL. One of the three yarns will contain a luxury fiber like cashmere, silk or a wool from a less common sheep breed.

Yarns are from a cat-friendly home; he's not allowed on yarn though or in the dye room.

The price listed below includes 3 months of priority mail shipping. If you would like it mailed outside of the US/Canada, please PM me and I'll put up a more accurate listing for you. First class shipping is available upon request. 

Need a double dose? PM me for a listing without a shipping charge for the double dose.

Please do not check out with another item at the same time as this one; it will not charge you enough for shipping.

name: Grown-Up Pink - dyed to order yarns
description:
Eponymous Sock
fiber content: 100% superwash merino
yardage: 400 yards
weight: 100 grams/3.5 oz
2 ply high twist. Lovely and soft.

Glitterati
fiber content: 75/20/5 Superwash Merino/Nylon/Stellina
yardage: 438 yards
weight: 100 grams/3.5 oz 
2-ply high twist. Adds a little sparkle to your life.


Terra Sock
fiber content: 75% superwash merino/25% nylon
yardage: 438 yards
weight: 100 grams/3.5 oz
3 ply springy yarn. nylon adds durability for socks

Aquae Singles:
fiber content: 100% superwash merino
yardage: 475 yards
weight: 4 oz/115 grams.
singles style construction, amazing for shawls, light weight fingerless gloves, scarves, etc.

Aquae Silk Singles
fiber content: 70% superwash merino, 30% silk
yardage: 438 yards
weight: 3.5 oz/100 grams
The silk gives this lovely singles construction yarn extra strength and shine!

Chione Superwash DK: 
fiber content: 100% superwash merino
yardage: 250 yards
weight: 115 grams/4.0 oz
DK/Light worsted 3 ply yarn. Takes deep color. 

Chione's MCN DK
fiber content: 80% SW Merino/ 10% Cashmere/10% Nylon
yardage: 231 yds
weight: 100 grams/3.5 oz
DK/Light worsted. The nylon gives it a bit of a bounce.

Please make sure you specify a color.

From a cat-friendly home. Yarn is stored away from the cats. I occasionally store the yarn with peppermint soap or bags of dried lavender which results in a very very lightly scented yarn.
